评论详情: Virtually all other shirts I have are large and they fit. Here I ordered an extra large and it was still too small. Can't get an XX large in time. Way to go. Also of note, the manufacturer here is using some sort of blue rinse in an attempt to make it look whiter. It's ugly.
I’m usually wear M size, I ordered L still very small.
Well made, but Way too small. I am 5'9", 200lbs, I wear a size 40 jacket. I bought an XXL but it fit me like a medium... I would need a 4XL
Way too small, size chart more for smaller size
I really liked the quality of the material and construction BUT I ordered an XL and it was more like a medium or large in size. I had to send it back.
A bit chinsy looking but it got the job done. Ordered for a costume and it worked!! The fabric is kinda itchy, but its worth the money for a quick fix
Hat mein Sohn bekommen zum Fasching. Er ist als Sushi Meister gegangen, weil er Sushi liebt. Jacke ist robust und hat einen tollen festen Stoff. Sehr zu empfehlen
自宅で寿司パフォーマンスをする際に購入しました。とても好評で、嬉しかったです！動きやすかったです！
Bel tessuto, fresco, ottima vestibilità. Oltre le aspettative... Ne acquisterò altre

Il prodotto è simile ma non conforme alle foto pubblicate, in quello consegnatomi è presente una tasca sul davanti che non è presente nè nelle foto nè nella descrizione. Io ho scelto di ordinare questo articolo proprio per l'assenza della tasca rispetto alle altre offerta che a circa lo stesso prezzo avrebbero inviato anche il pantalone.
Habe 2 bestellt und bezahlt. Leider nur 1 geliefert und eine Kosmetiktasche statt dem 2. Hemd?
